lead_paragraph: Santiago Botero was cleared of doping allegations by the Colombian Cycling Federation, allowing him to rejoin international competition after he was sidelined since June. Botero’s name surfaced in a Spanish doping investigation that implicated 56 cyclists. That led the Phonak team to leave Botero off its Tour de France roster this summer.
